sessions.title: Azure Networking - A love story between a Hub and a Spoke
sessions.description: Join my session on Azure Networking as we explore the creation of virtual networks, VPN connections, and network peering. This hands-on session will guide you through the process of building virtual networks and establishing secure connections. Learn how to configure VPN gateways, for seamless connectivity between on-premises networks and Azure virtual networks. Discover the power of network peering to connect virtual networks within Azure and enable secure communication across different network boundaries. Gain practical skills and knowledge to enhance your Azure Networking projects and unlock the true potential of cloud networking.

speaker.name: Eduard Keilholz
speaker.title: Team Lead & Solution Architect at 4DotNet | Azure MVP

sessions.title: Dynamic Cost Modeling in the Cloud: Adaptive Strategies for Optimal Cloud Management and Financial Success
sessions.description: We'll explore the ever-changing landscape of cloud costs and present adaptive techniques to model these costs effectively. Learn how to marry technical requirements with financial goals to achieve a balanced, optimized cloud environment

speaker.name: Twan Koot
speaker.title: Principal expert Azure & Codesmith @ Ordina | Speaker | Trainer
